Criteria: Company describes enterprise-level transformation and scale
Search Query: "enterprise" OR "global" OR "multi-year strategy" OR "transformation roadmap" OR "at scale"
Signals: enterprise, global, transformation roadmap, multi-year strategy, at scale

Criteria: Mentions digital transformation or intelligent systems
Search Query: "digital transformation" OR "transforming operations" OR "accelerating innovation" OR "intelligent systems"
Signals: digital transformation, intelligent systems, accelerating innovation

Criteria: Mentions use of AI in at least two different business functions
Search Query: "supply chain" OR "inventory" OR "finance" OR "customer experience" OR "R&D" OR "IT" OR "automation" OR "marketing"
Signals: supply chain, finance, customer experience, R&D, IT, automation, marketing

Criteria: Mentions structured AI programs or leadership roles
Search Query: "Chief AI Officer" OR "AI assistant" OR "AI center" OR "AI innovation" OR "strategic AI partner"
Signals: Chief AI Officer, AI assistant, AI center, AI innovation, strategic AI partner

Criteria: Mentions formal AI strategy, budget, or program ownership
Search Query: "AI strategy" OR "AI roadmap" OR "AI budget" OR "AI initiative"
Signals: AI strategy, AI roadmap, AI investment, strategic AI initiative

Criteria: Company is tech-driven or platform-based and delivers services via web or mobile app
Search Query: "platform" OR "digital" OR "tech-driven" OR "mobile app" OR "online service"
Signals: platform, digital, tech-driven, mobile app, online service

Criteria: Company offers personalized, real-time, or automated digital services as a core feature
Search Query: "personalized" OR "real-time" OR "automated" OR "tailored" OR "forecast" OR "instant delivery"
Signals: personalized, real-time, automated, tailored, forecast, instant delivery

Criteria: Mentions fast iteration, innovation, or scaling of digital services
Search Query: "rapid growth" OR "fast scaling" OR "global expansion" OR "innovation" OR "agile"
Signals: rapid growth, fast scaling, global expansion, innovation, agile

Criteria: References using customer behavior or data insights to enhance services
Search Query: "customer data" OR "user insights" OR "behavior analysis" OR "personalized experience"
Signals: customer data, user insights, behavior analysis, personalized experience

Criteria: Company offers consulting, development, or integration services that include AI-enabled solutions for enterprise clients
Search Query: "AI solutions" OR "AI platform" OR "AI consulting" OR "enterprise AI" OR "AI integration"
Signals: AI solutions, AI platform, AI consulting, enterprise AI, AI integration

Criteria: Company states it builds, integrates, or deploys AI solutions or platforms for enterprise clients
Search Query: "builds AI" OR "integrates AI" OR "deploys AI" OR "AI tools" OR "AI services"
Signals: builds AI, integrates AI, deploys AI, AI tools, AI services

Criteria: Mentions industry-specific or verticalized AI services (e.g. finance, manufacturing, healthcare)
Search Query: "finance" OR "manufacturing" OR "healthcare" OR "industry-specific" OR "retail" OR "audit"
Signals: finance, manufacturing, healthcare, industry-specific, retail, audit

Criteria: Mentions a proprietary or branded AI platform, framework, or packaged solution
Search Query: "AI Refinery" OR "Omnia" OR "Applied AI" OR "Topaz" OR "agentic AI"
Signals: AI Refinery, Omnia, Applied AI, Topaz, agentic AI

Criteria: Company describes itself as an AI or ML company, or clearly presents AI as its business focus
Search Query: "AI company" OR "ML company" OR "AI-first" OR "AI-native"
Signals: AI company, AI-native, ML startup, AI-first

Criteria: AI models, tools, or platforms are described as the core product or service
Search Query: "AI platform" OR "AI model" OR "AI video" OR "AI-generated" OR "AI assistant"
Signals: AI product, AI model, core service, AI tool

Criteria: Mentions real-time performance, developer control, or customization features
Search Query: "real-time" OR "developer platform" OR "customization" OR "flexible" OR "creative tools"
Signals: real-time tools, developer-led, creative control

Criteria: Describes a multimodal or frontier AI use case (e.g., image, video, audio, code generation)
Search Query: "video generation" OR "image synthesis" OR "audio AI" OR "code generation" OR "multimodal AI"
Signals: GenAI, video, image, audio, code, multimodal use cases

Criteria: Organization is a municipal, state, or national public body or agency
Search Query: "government agency" OR "public sector" OR "ministry" OR "municipality"
Signals: public sector, agency, ministry, public body

Criteria: Mentions AI projects in citizen services, healthcare, infrastructure, or public operations
Search Query: "AI project" OR "citizen services" OR "diagnostics" OR "chatbots" OR "smart city"
Signals: AI for citizen services, AI in diagnostics, public service automation

Criteria: Mentions responsible AI, data protection, transparency, or public accountability
Search Query: "responsible AI" OR "citizen data" OR "public accountability" OR "ethical AI" OR "privacy" OR "digital ID"
Signals: responsible AI, citizen privacy, ethical use, digital ID

Criteria: Describes AI pilot programs, trials, or innovation initiatives
Search Query: "AI trial" OR "pilot project" OR "innovation initiative" OR "R&D program"
Signals: AI pilots, innovation, research initiative, public testing

Criteria: The company does not have headquarters in Mainlaind China, Iran or Russia.
